text.div:
The Rolling Sweep of a Storm Tossed Sea
-when Phantom Fingers play

These are the Phantom
Hands of a thousand
immortal pianists; their
glorious genius preserv-
ed forever, through the
miracle of Welte-
Mignon* reproduction.

Thunder of breaking waves;
howl of the hurricane; crash of
thunder; or, with your changing
mood, mesmeric lure of the
Lorelie's song; swinging measure
of the Blue Danube; love-wrapt
night"when the moon swings low"
... played by the master musicians
of the century in your own home,
whenever you wish.
The Welte-Mignon* brings a won-
drous gift to you. With uncanny
fidelity, this supreme reproducing

instrument preserves the actual
playing of immortal musicians.
Their phantom fingers perform,
again, at your command.
The Welte-Mignon* is invisible
and does not interfere with man-
ual playing. It is obtainable in
practically every good make of
piano, either grand or upright.
Write for interesting brochure.
Auto-Pneumatic Action Co., W.
C. Heaton, President, 12th Ave.
at 51st St., New York.

Welte-Mignon
(Licensee)
Hear it-in comparison. There's a nearby dealer
*Licensed under the original Welte-Mignon patents.
